item.title: Twitter From The Command Line
item.description: Twitter has become popular with many of us recently. Most of us are too lazy to use the web interface to do a update. So there are options like twitter for firefox, twitgin for pidgin and so on. But still most of are CLI oriented and rarely visit the GUI. I am one such guy. So when I came to hear about Twitter API, I was excited and started to write a simple python script to update to Twitter.
